name: liyakhath
diet_plan:
| **Day** | **Meal Type** | **Meal Item** | **Portion Size** | **Calories** | **Proteins (g)** | **Carbs (g)** | **Fats (g)** | **Vitamins** | **Other Nutrients** |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| **1** | **Breakfast** | Besan Chilla with Vegetable Filling | 2 pieces | 300 | 20 | 45 | 10 | Vitamin A, Vitamin C | Iron, Calcium |
| | **Lunch** | Gujarati Kadhi with Rotli | 1 cup kadhi, 2 rotlis | 450 | 25 | 60 | 15 | Vitamin D, Vitamin B12 | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Dinner** | Khichdi with Dal and Vegetable | 1 cup khichdi, 1/2 cup dal | 350 | 20 | 50 | 10 | Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2 | Fiber, Iron |
| | **Snacks** |Roasted Chana(100g) 1 bowl yogurt(100g) | 300 | 20 | 50 | 10 | Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2 | Fiber, Iron |
| **2** | **Breakfast** | Vegetable Upma with Coconut Chutney | 1 cup | 250 | 15 | 40 | 10 | Vitamin C, Vitamin E | Iron, Calcium |
| | **Lunch** | Dhokla with Green Chutney | 6 pieces | 300 | 18 | 45 | 12 | Vitamin A, Vitamin B12 | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Dinner** | Gujarati Dal with Bhakhri | 1 cup dal, 2 bhakhris | 400 | 22 | 55 | 15 | Vitamin D, Vitamin B12 | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Snacks** |Fruit (100g),Trail Mix(50g) | 300 | 20 | 50 | 10 | Vitamin C, Vitamin E | Iron, Calcium |
| **3** | **Breakfast** | Poha with Vegetables | 1 cup | 280 | 16 | 42 | 12 | Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2 | Iron, Calcium |
| | **Lunch** | Undhiyu with Rotli | 1 cup undhiyu, 2 rotlis | 450 | 25 | 60 | 15 | Vitamin A, Vitamin C | Calcium, Iron |

| | **Lunch** | Gujarati Thali with Rice, Dal, Sabzi, and Roti | 1 plate | 500 | 28 | 70 | 18 | Vitamin A, Vitamin D | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Dinner** | Gujarati Kadhi with Rotli | 1 cup kadhi, 2 rotlis | 450 | 25 | 60 | 15 | Vitamin D, Vitamin B12 | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Snacks** |Fruit bowl(200g),Coconut Water(300ml) | 350 | 20 | 55 | 10 | Vitamin A, Vitamin C | Iron, Calcium |
| **5** | **Breakfast** | Dhokla with Green Chutney | 6 pieces | 300 | 18 | 45 | 12 | Vitamin A, Vitamin B12 | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Lunch** | Khichdi with Dal and Vegetable | 1 cup khichdi, 1/2 cup dal | 350 | 20 | 50 | 10 | Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2 | Fiber, Iron |
| | **Dinner** | Gujarati Dal with Bhakhri | 1 cup dal, 2 bhakhris | 400 | 22 | 55 | 15 | Vitamin D, Vitamin B12 | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Snacks** |Dry Fruits(50g), Buttermilk(250ml) | 300 | 20 | 50 | 10 | Vitamin C, Vitamin E | Iron, Calcium |
| **6** | **Breakfast** | Besan Chilla with Vegetable Filling | 2 pieces | 300 | 20 | 45 | 10 | Vitamin A, Vitamin C | Iron, Calcium |
| | **Lunch** | Undhiyu with Rotli | 1 cup undhiyu, 2 rotlis | 450 | 25 | 60 | 15 | Vitamin A, Vitamin C | Calcium, Iron |
| | **Dinner** | Sabudana Khichdi with Peanut Chutney | 1 cup | 300 | 18 | 45 | 12 | Vitamin C, Vitamin E | Iron, Calcium |
| | **Snacks** |Sprouts(100g),Banana Smoothie(300ml) | 350 | 20 | 55 | 10 | Vitamin A, Vitamin C | Iron, Calcium |
| **7** | **Breakfast** | Vegetable Upma with Coconut Chutney | 1 cup | 250 | 15 | 40 | 10 | Vitamin C, Vitamin E | Iron, Calcium |
| | **Lunch** | Gujarati Kadhi with Rotli | 1 cup kadhi, 2 rotlis | 450 | 25 | 60 | 15 | Vitamin D, Vitamin B12 | Calcium, Iron |

**Note:**
- This diet plan provides approximately 2,500-2,800 calories per day, which is suitable for a moderately active male with a gym building goal.
- The plan is rich in protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats to support muscle growth and recovery.
- The portion sizes are approximate and can be adjusted based on individual needs and preferences.
- It is recommended to consult with a registered dietitian or healthcare professional before starting any new diet plan.
